title: Amazon MQ for RabbitMQ to AWS Lambda
description: Deploys a Lambda function, a RabbitMQ queue and the IAM permissions required to run the application. RabbitMQ invokes the Lambda function when new messages are available.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This template deploys a Lambda function, a RabbitMQ queue and the IAM permissions required to run the application.
RabbitMQ invokes the Lambda function when new messages are available.
